com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.entity.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Material, MatrixInterpolationTest, PhysicalObject, World

    public class Entity
extends Object
    An object in the world that can have a user interface. Does not require physical presence.
    Author:
    danroyer

    • Method Detail

      • getContextPanel

        public ArrayList<JPanel> getContextPanel(RobotOverlord gui)
        Get the EntityControlPanel for this class' superclass, then the EntityPanel for this class, and so on.
        Parameters:
        gui - the main application instance.
        Returns:
        the list of EntityPanels

      • getAllContextPanels

        public JComponent getAllContextPanels(RobotOverlord gui)
        Get all the EntityControlPanels for this Entity.

        If this class is derived from Entity, get the panels for the derived Entities, too. Normally this is called by RobotOverlord.

        Parameters:
        gui - the main application instance.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all the panels for this Entity and all derived classes.

      • getStatusMessage

        public String getStatusMessage()
        Do you have a status to report to the GUI? Override this with your class' status.
        Returns:
        a String. Cannot be null. default is "".
